item.title: Whoami?
item.description:
‚ùìIntroduction

Hii, I’m Appiah Bismark ‚ÄúAlso known online as Kwesi Larry(0kxwizard),an Application Security Tester and Bug Hunter with experience in scripting, networking and linux administration. I Love breaking things (ethically), and sharing my knowledge, I love learning and mostly use my leisure time to do OSINT and Forensics Investigations and sometimes play chess.

üí° Skills

  • Penetration Testing: OWASP Top 10, Web Application Testing,Wireless Network Testing.
  • Programming: Python, Bash scripting.
  • Investigations: OSINT Investigations, Forensics Investigations.
  • Security Auditing: Vulnerability Assessment and Penetration Testing, Report writing, Code Reviews,Bug Hunting.
  • Miscellaneous: Docker, Git, Markdown.
  • Tools: Metasploit, Burpsuite, OWASP Zap, NMAP,Wireshark,Nessuss.

üèÖ Achievements and Certifications

-TryHackMe Junior Penetration Tester certificate here
